subject: feat: add AND/OR/Exclude filter mode selector
body:
- Add filter mode buttons (All/Any/Exclude)
- Refactor getFilteredCommits to support all three modes
- Date range always applies regardless of mode
- Clear button resets mode to AND

https://claude.ai/code/session_018w7ThuzVv2QNHpRDmtwQDA
title: add AND/OR/Exclude filter mode selector
